item.title: WordPress starter theme – Foundation
item.description: Foundationis a rapid prototyping and building library from ZURB. Which is basically great CSS framework. Light, quick in development and good looking. In last days I just discover great based starter theme based on this CSS framework – check it out Foundation for WordPressor just download directly from GitHub
